title: Pleasantly Surprised
body:
So I was lead to believe that this new Boards thing was going to do bad things for the community, that it was going to be a hub of toxicity ... So far though, I have no idea what those people were talking about. The conversations I've seen have been civil and respectful, and there's been very little nastiness.

I like it, OCE!

replies.body: It's the same people pretty much, just a different look. I have no idea why people thought it was going to be some massive change.
I'd wager it's because they saw how it divided the NA community, and just assumed the same thing would happen here, before giving it a chance.
I like the boards, the only downside, plebs who got a permaban from the forums can post here along side us civil folk like nothing happened.
Give it time. They'll ruin their second chance eventually.
There's also a lot of circlejerking.... Especially from Rioters

I learn a new word every day in this forum... 
http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=circle+jerking
Am I meant to say "xD" now?

> There's also a lot of circlejerking.... Especially from Rioters

You seem mad because you're not getting any action.
That's because all those people are still back on the old forums. Only the civil people who have embraced the boards come here ATM.
This was the secret nature of the boards I guess. To make everyone on the forums more civil. For instance I'm still a troll on the old forums but all I've done here is do constructive stuff.
Making people civil is the opposite of what GDers want. Most of us anyway.

I'm surprised by how much I enjoy the boards myself now. My only two problems were colour and chronological order. One of them was dealt with by Rito's help, and I'm getting used to the colour :P

Good thing is that you can reply quicker and more efficiently, and even post champion/summoner spell/item icons
Now, when is Riot going to allow us to post ability icons or are there too many/do we just need to post the actual file?
